name: Guff
description:
Your new pet is named Guff.

Guff has a maximum lifespan of 90 days, he will die of old age past that point. Don't forget to feed and water him as well! If either hunger or thirst reach 100 it is game over.

Feed Guff regularly to receive points. The faster you keep up with him, the higher your end score.

Your Guff will change colors depending on their health, so keep an eye out.

Requirements

You must have NET 6.0 installed and a Windows operating system to run this game.
NET 6.0 can be downloaded here.

A Note

Please tell me immediately if there are any bugs or errors! You can either comment or contact me directly on Discord at Ditzy#6829 or on Twitter at @kayditzy.

Guff was created using Raylib-cs.
